overview: Manny Pacquiao vs. Lucas Matthysse, billed as Fight of Champions, was a boxing match for the WBA welterweight championship. The event took place on July 15, 2018 at the Axiata Arena in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. Pacquiao won the fight by 7th-round TKO and Matthysse announced his retirement shortly thereafter.
title: Pacquiao vs. Matthysse
